channel.title: Flue sizing
channel.description: I have access to a wood fired soda kiln, based on Peg Udall's design. We've fired several times and have trouble getting temp *10 on top. It was built with what appear to be very large flue openings. Is there any formula, rule of thumb for the size of flue opening?
